sectionHeader.title: Frequently Asked Questions
sectionHeader.subtitle: Everything you need to know about CloudGlance

faqs.question: How long does it take to get started?
faqs.answer: It's surprisingly simple. You can be analyzing your first documents in minutes. For a full enterprise deployment with integrations, our dedicated success team ensures a seamless process that typically takes less than a week.
highlights: Less than a week for full deployment

faqs.question: How secure is our data?
faqs.answer: Security is our top priority. We are SOC 2 Certified and built with enterprise-grade security protocols. Your data is encrypted both in transit and at rest, giving you bank-grade security and complete peace of mind.

faqs.question: How accurate is the AI? Can we trust it?
faqs.answer: We achieve 99.7% extraction accuracy across all document types. Our RAG technology ensures every answer is 100% verifiable and cited directly to the source document, eliminating any risk of AI "hallucination."

faqs.question: Can it handle our company's specific and complex documents?
faqs.answer: Yes. Our platform is engineered to handle the complexity of documents across demanding industries like engineering, construction, and government. It can also be fine-tuned for your specific needs.

customization.description: Custom training on your specific terminology and formats

faqs.question: What kind of Return on Investment (ROI) can we realistically expect?
faqs.answer: Our clients typically see a full payback period of under 4 months. This is achieved by drastically reducing manual labor hours, minimizing costly errors, and winning more high-value business.

additionalQuestions.question: Does CloudGlance support on-premise deployment?
additionalQuestions.answer: Yes, we offer flexible deployment options including cloud, on-premise, and hybrid solutions.

additionalQuestions.question: What file formats are supported?
additionalQuestions.answer: We support all major formats including PDF, DOCX, XLSX, images, and even zipped archives.

additionalQuestions.question: Can multiple teams use the platform simultaneously?
additionalQuestions.answer: Absolutely. CloudGlance is designed for enterprise-wide collaboration with role-based access control.

additionalQuestions.question: Is training provided?
additionalQuestions.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive onboarding, training, and ongoing support for all users.

additionalQuestions.question: How does pricing work?
additionalQuestions.answer: We offer flexible pricing based on your organization's size and needs. Contact us for a custom quote.

contactSupport.title: Still have questions?
contactSupport.subtitle: Our team is here to help
